name: BIC Flex 4 Disposable Razor
description: Achieve a smoother shave with the BIC Flex 4 Disposable Razor. This razor features four flexible blades that individually adjust to the contours of your skin. The heavy ergonomic handle offers added control, while the pivoting head and lubricating strip with aloe and vitamin E enhance the glide. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
